channel.title: 317 PI Bows Shoot 1 More Arrow After Dead
channel.description: So as i said in the Subject all my bows shoot 1 more extra arrow after the monster or person is dead. Is there a way to fix this? I have searched Google and here for a answer but was not able to find anything.

item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

So as i said in the Subject all my bows shoot 1 more extra arrow after the monster or person is dead. Is there a way to fix this? I have searched Google and here for a answer but was not able to find anything.
